Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.serverController

Interface CommunicationInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:

  • Method Details

    • receiveMessageTCP

      default void receiveMessageTCP(Message message, HandleClientSocket client) throws IllegalAccessException, InvalidNicknameException, InvalidMoveException, InvalidChoiceException, RemoteException
      Throws:
      IllegalAccessException
      InvalidNicknameException
      InvalidMoveException
      InvalidChoiceException
      RemoteException

    • receiveMessageRMI

      default void receiveMessageRMI(String messageString, ClientCommunicationInterface client) throws RemoteException
      Handles incoming messages from a remote client via RMI (Remote Method Invocation). The method decodes the JSON string to a Message object and performs actions based on the message type.
      Parameters:
      messageString - The JSON string representing the message from the client.
      client - The ClientCommunicationInterface instance representing the remote client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI communication-related error occurs.

    • updateClientsPlayedCard

      default void updateClientsPlayedCard(PlayableCard playedCard, Coordinates coordinates) throws RemoteException
      Notifies all clients about a played PlayableCard with its coordinates.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - The PlayableCard that was played.
      coordinates - The Coordinates where the card was played.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI communication-related error occurs.

    • updateClientsPlayedCard

      default void updateClientsPlayedCard(GoldCard playedCard, Coordinates coordinates) throws RemoteException
      Notifies all clients about a played GoldCard with its coordinates.
      Parameters:
      playedCard - The GoldCard that was played.
      coordinates - The Coordinates where the card was played.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI communication-related error arrives.

    • updateClientsDrawnCard

      default void updateClientsDrawnCard(PlayableCard drawnCard) throws RemoteException
      Notifies all clients about a drawn PlayableCard.
      Parameters:
      drawnCard - The PlayableCard that was drawn.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI communication error arrives.

    • updateClientsDrawnCard

      default void updateClientsDrawnCard(GoldCard drawnCard) throws RemoteException
      Notifies all clients about a drawn GoldCard.
      Parameters:
      drawnCard - The GoldCard that was drawn.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI communication error occurs.

    • numberOfPlayers

      default void numberOfPlayers(int num, ClientCommunicationInterface client) throws RemoteException
      Handles the number of players for the game. Validates the provided number of players and starts the game if the number is correct and the game is full.
      Parameters:
      num - The number of players for the game.
      client - The ClientCommunicationInterface instance representing the remote client.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI communication error arrives.

    • checkNickname

      default void checkNickname(ClientCommunicationInterface client, String nickname, int checkNicknameStatus) throws RemoteException
      Handles the validation and processing of a client's nickname during login. Based on the status of the nickname check, it performs appropriate actions including handling game states, notifying clients, adding players, and starting or restoring the game.
      Parameters:
      client - The ClientCommunicationInterface instance representing the remote client.
      nickname - The nickname of the player attempting to log in.
      checkNicknameStatus - The status code indicating the result of the nickname check.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI communication error arrives

    • startGame

      default void startGame() throws RemoteException
      Initializes and starts the game by setting the game state to IN_GAME and sending initial game data to all clients. This includes visible resource cards, starter cards, and common and secret objective cards.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI communication-related error occurs.

    • startRestoredGame

      default void startRestoredGame() throws RemoteException
      Restores and starts a saved game by setting the game state to IN_GAME and sending the restored game data to all clients. This includes visible cards, common objectives, scores, hands, and play areas.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI communication-related error arrives.

    • sendMessage

      default void sendMessage(Message message, ClientCommunicationInterface client) throws RemoteException
      Sends a message to a client using the Remote Method Invocation (RMI) mechanism. The message is converted to a JSON string and sent via the client's `receiveCard` method.
      Parameters:
      message - The Message object to be sent. This contains the data that needs to be transmitted to the client.
      client - The ClientCommunicationInterface through which the message is to be sent.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI communication-related error is presented

    • sendStartCondition

      default void sendStartCondition() throws RemoteException
      Sends the start condition of the game to all connected clients via both TCP and RMI. The start condition includes each player's starter cards and hands.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI communication-related error occurs.

    • startTurn

      default void startTurn() throws RemoteException
      Throws:
      RemoteException

    • changeTurn

      default void changeTurn() throws RemoteException
      Changes the turn in the game and handles game state transitions accordingly. Updates the current player and determines the next actions based on the game state: - Saves the game state and starts a new turn if the game is ongoing. - Sends a "LastRound" message to all clients if it is the last round. - Sends final scores and announces the game winner if the game has ended.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI communication-related error occurs.

    • sendMessageToAll

      default void sendMessageToAll(Message message) throws RemoteException
      Sends a message to all connected clients, both TCP and RMI.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to be sent to all clients.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI communication-related error occurs.

    • sendMessageToAllExcept

      default void sendMessageToAllExcept(String currentPlayerNickname, Message message) throws RemoteException
      Sends a message to all connected TCP clients except the specified player's client. Also sends a specific message to all RMI clients except the specified player.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayerNickname - The nickname of the current player whose client should not receive the message.
      message - The message to be sent to all TCP clients except the specified player.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI communication-related error occurs.

    • updateScores

      default void updateScores() throws RemoteException
      Updates and broadcasts the scores to all connected clients.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI communication-related error occurs.

    • sendMessageToAllExceptRMI

      default void sendMessageToAllExceptRMI(String currentPlayerNickname, String scelta) throws RemoteException
      Sends a message to all connected RMI clients except the current player. This method is typically used to broadcast a message or notification to all clients, excluding the client whose nickname matches the current player's nickname.
      Parameters:
      currentPlayerNickname - The nickname of the current player whose client should not receive the message.
      scelta - The choice or action represented by the message to be sent.
      Throws:
      RemoteException - If an RMI communication-related error occurs.

    • stop

      default void stop() throws RemoteException
      Throws:
      RemoteException
